thread.title: Russia angry at 'boorish' expulsion of diplomats

title: Russia angry at 'boorish' expulsion of diplomats
text:
Russia angry at 'boorish' expulsion of diplomats Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 01:51 
Russia's foreign minister says the expulsion of the country's diplomats is ''boorish, anti-Russian behavior'', as NATO announced it too was following suit in response to a nerve agent attack in Britain. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Russia's foreign minister says the expulsion of the country's diplomats is "boorish, anti-Russian behavior", as NATO announced it too was following suit in response to a nerve agent attack in Britain.
